meanings.definition: Involving or characterized by bloodshed or violence.
meanings.sent1: The battle was the bloodiest in history, with many soldiers injured.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie was the bloodiest film I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The kids' water balloon fight turned into the bloodiest mess on the playground.
meanings.sent4: The rivalry between the two teams reached its bloodiest peak during the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The crime scene was the bloodiest sight the detective had encountered in his career.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of bloody, used to describe something as the most violent or brutal.
meanings.sent1: The dictator's regime was the bloodiest in the nation's history, causing immense suffering.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie was the bloodiest film of the year, shocking audiences with its graphic scenes.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the title of 'best pumpkin pie' turned into the bloodiest baking contest ever.
meanings.sent4: The storm unleashed its fury in the bloodiest display of nature's power.
meanings.sent5: The final battle in the fantasy novel was the bloodiest clash between good and evil.
